headline: HP DC POWER SUPPLY
categories.lvl2: Test & Measurement Equipment  >  Power Supplies > DC Power Supplies
specstable:
Manufacturer Hewlett Packard
Model 6624A (4) Output
Panel Meters Digital
Interface USB
Accessories
  • 4 independent, dual-range outputs with low ripple and fast up/down programming.
    Outputs:
  • (2)0 to 7/20 volts, 0 to 5/2 amps;
  • (2)0 to 20/50 volts, 0 to 2/0.8 amps.
  • 40 Watt
Other Information
  • GPIB programming of voltage and current
  • Measured voltage and current readback over the GPIB
  • Two outputs can be connected in parallel or in series

    Automatic selection of operating voltage and current range
  • Programmable over-voltage and over-current protection
  • Self-test occurs at power-on from an GPIB command
  • Electronic calibration via GPIB
  • 10 store-recall states
  • SCPI (Standard Comments for Programming Instruments)
    Features:
  • HP-IB programming of voltage and current, OVP, OCP, readback, power-on
Power Requirements 100-240 V 8.0 A 4.0 A(2) 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
CE Marked YES
Condition Very Good
Exterior Dimensions
Width 16.750 in (42.5 cm)
Depth 21.000 in (53.3 cm)
Height 5.250 in (13.3 cm)
Weight 41 lb (19 kg)
